app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Philips voice recorder
app_description: SPEAK SEND DONE The Philips voice recorder app offers first class recording quality professional functions such as inserting or cutting sequences and an intuitive operation. For maximum security browser based file management and additional services such as speech recognition we recommend the use of our convenient Philips SpeechLive service. PHILIPS SPEECHLIVE USE THE FULL POTENTIAL OF PHILIPS VOICE RECORDER APP In combination with Philips SpeechLive you can benefit from many other advantages: SPEECH RECOGNITION TRANSCRIPTION SERVICE INTEGRATION OF YOUR PERSONAL ASSISTANT BROWSER BASED FILE MANAGEMENT AND WORKFLOW INDIVIDUAL USER MANAGEMENT TAILORED SOLUTION Do you have special requirements for your dictation workflow The Philips dictation app can be seamlessly integrated into your existing workflow.
